title: Sample, "Square Top", 1970–79
medium:
Medium: 90% wool, 10% mohair
Technique: plain weave like interlacing with change of float spans to create a staggered alignment of alternate wefts which are thick
description: Off-white textured weave created by the alternation of thick and thin wefts.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample, "Square Top", 1970–79.Medium: 90% wool, 10% mohair
Technique: plain weave like interlacing with change of float spans to create a staggered alignment of alternate wefts which are thick. 1975-17-5.
